## SchemasService.getSchemaInstanceData() method

Gets instance data of a specified Schema including default field values. This operation returns an instance of 'SchemaInstance' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getSchemaInstanceData(escapedSchemaId: string): CancelablePromise<SchemaInstance>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter       | Type   | Description                                                                                         |
| --------------- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| escapedSchemaId | string | The TCM URI of a Schema with the colon escaped by replacing it with an underscore. E.g. "tcm_1-1-8" |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;[SchemaInstance](./open-api-client.schemainstance.md)<!-- -->&gt;

SchemaInstance The request was successful.

## Exceptions

ApiError
